error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to CatLink servers. Please check your internet connection and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please check your credentials and try again.

user.description: You must use a different account than the one on the mobile app. Use the share feature in the app to create a dedicated account for Home Assistant, because only one instance can be logged in per account at a time. Enter your full phone number with country code (e.g. +447911123456).
user.title: Connect to CatLink

discovery.description: Found {total_count} device(s): {supported_count} fully supported, {unsupported_count} with limited support. Select which devices to add. Supported devices are pre-selected for quick setup.
discovery.title: Discover devices

init.description: Add or remove devices and configure the refresh interval. Changes take effect after reload.
init.title: Manage devices
